Web Navigation & Interaction: Visited the website and viewed the login page
Encounter a message saying browser is unsupported.

Test the vulnerability using the crafted payload
Notice the validation of arbitrary code execution
Review the results to list all tables.

Password Manipulation & Cracking: If a guess was not successful, the full password has been guessed.
SQL Injection: Created exploit using SQL injection: 'adm' || trim('in', ` Password: `) || ''
Attempt to break out of the string with a single quote in '?cat=news''.
Data Extraction & Analysis: Ensured the script utilizes a previously saved cache.
Extract hidden data from the .DS_Store file.

Code and Source Analysis: Check the source code of the website.

Input Validation & Filtering: Realize that JavaScript doesn't execute when directly input into the application's fields.
